sourceText: We are not allowed to visit other people right now because of COVID-19. This will keep them and us safe while making sure our health services are able to support those who are sick.
text: We are not allowed to visit other people right now because of COVID-19. This will keep them and us safe while making sure our health services are able to support those who are sick.

sourceText: Why can’t I go play with my friends today?
text: Why can’t I go play with my friends today?

sourceText: I can see that you are upset, Sam. It can be difficult when we feel separated from our friends.
text: I can see that you are upset, Sam. It can be difficult when we feel separated from our friends.

sourceText: As soon as we are able, you can play with your friends. In the meantime, we can draw some pictures of your favourite times playing with them.
